website_summaries.verdict: Stylish, well-made holder than can accommodate numerous large candles.
pros: Attractive tapered design holds 9 pillar candles
Makes a nice piece for a fireplace
cons: Requires assembly, but fortunately it's not too difficult to put together

customer_reviews.title: fireplace 9 candle holder
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled that the item arrived within 24 hours so I could complete the new look in my living room. I don't know how sturdy it is, but so far so good. I think it would be nice if the holder parts were a little more apart from each other and perhaps have a wider base. It fits in my fireplace with some extra room. But all in all I am pleased with it and especially with the quick free delivery. The next day I also ordered a candle snuffer which came in LESS than 24 hours!! Very happy with that except that I wish it had a bit longer handle.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Jay

customer_reviews.title: Check the size
customer_reviews.text: I love the remote feature of the candles. I may order another set as they are a little smaller than I thought, but that is my fault as the size was clearly described
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, fit the application I needed it for well.
customer_reviews.author: Scientific Tester

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble...looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and looks great in the fireplace. I am very happy with it. I wanted one that didn't have the spikes in each holder for real candles, because I'm using battery operated candles with a timer. So, it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Macquoid

customer_reviews.title: Easily  Update your Candle displays
customer_reviews.text: Item arrives with easy screw assembly, no tools needed. I'm using it for my fireplace candle display when not burning logs.
customer_reviews.author: bee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: It looks great in my fireplace. I used candles of different sizes and weights. Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It's well made and looks great in front of my fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Angela S Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Quick ship. Was able to put together easily and quickly. Solid structure.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Riley

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace Holder
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace holder worked for me because of the space I needed it for. It was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Moi Lord

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described and fits perfectly where I needed it. Good quality and fair price.
customer_reviews.author: kathi Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my husband since he wanted something to put in the fireplace. Also bought LED candles. We enjoyed them during the holidays and it will be nice all winter.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great product especially for the price - my ONLY complaint is that a couple of the pillars were bent making them slightly crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this candelabra and some remote controlled candles to put in the fireplace. My husband and I were very pleased with the looks of the candelabra and the candles.
customer_reviews.author: Jerri Law

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with some electronic candles and they look great! Easy to put together and light to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love the touch this item added to my fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Carmella Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this purchase. It was exactly what I expected. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Maile Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Easily assemable basic candle holder.
customer_reviews.text: This item was just as advertised - a basic candle holder. It was easy to assemble and functions great.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Cirko

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my fireplace. It was simple to put together and looks really pretty! Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great fireplace display
customer_reviews.text: We used these in our fireplace for Christmas. They worked great with our electric candles.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy  Garretson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This candle holder arrived exactly as advertised! Great value and just what I needed for a faux fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Ries

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to fireplace
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice in the fireplace, but was a bit smaller than anticipated. Not a deal breaker though.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Ray Barnes, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in our space. I have received many compliments on it. A little wobbly but does the trick. I do find I have to tighten the vertical posts occasionally .
customer_reviews.author: Erica Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy multiple candle display
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for displaying multiple candles in the fireplace (instead of an actual log fire). The varied heights add to the appeal.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Just add candles and enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to assemble, very happy with product, would not hesitate to recommend. Got several compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Wade

product_meta.title: Only-us Black Metal Pillar Candle Candelabra for Fireplace/Table/Wedding/Christmas Decoration Iron Candlestick Holders of 9 DIY Candle Holders
product_meta.description:
♥ ----------------------------------------------------- SIMPLE, EXTREME, GENEROUS------------------------------------------------------ ♥ 


 

Having Fluent Geometrical Line And Stratified Design, this candlestick holder emanates the refined charm.

The black candelabra is made with iron, it’s very sturdy and durable.

 Simple, Beautiful and Generous , the metal candlestick suits the household of any style.

Matching real wax or flameless candles,the table candelabra will bring warmth and soft glow to any room in your home . You can put them in living room, bedroom, study, bar, cafe, spa,christmas,halloween and also can use the black candle holder as birthday, wedding and housewarming gift.

SPECIFICATION:

Diameter of each platform: 3.5 inches

Height of the 9 platforms:one is 2 inches / two are 4 inches / two are 5 inches / one is 5.5 inches / two are 6 inches / one is 7 inches

Color: black

Materical: Iron

Package: a black candlestick of 9 different height trays


You can also view the size image on the left to understand the size of the product.

If you like the metal candle holder as much as I do, bring them home quickly. You deserve them.

Tip:

1.DIY assemble and install,you can assemble each part simply.

2.non-flame candles are not included in this product. If you need, you can choose from our store.
feature_bullets: ✔【The Black Candle Holder is made with Iron 】and can hold 9 real wax or flameless candles.
✔【SIZE】:Each small platform of this metal candelabra is 3.5-inch diameter. Height: 2 inches / 4 inches / 5 inches / 5.5 inches / 6 inches / 7 inches.
✔【SIMPLE AND GENEROUS】:The black candlestick of stratified geometric design will add new charm to your home.The base plat is also very solid,and can DIY assembly.
✔【USE】: The candlestick holder is suitable for any table or fireplace,it can also be used for weddings, parties, spa and so on.

✔【Quality assurance】:If you have any questions after purchasing our geometric candle holder, please feel free to contact us,we will reply to you as soon as possible within 24 hours and provide you with free return and replacement service within 30 days.
